name: Config Wars
description:
In Config Wars you can play in epic multiplayer battles to defend your civilization. The units to fight those battle will be configured in real-time. This game, developed by DaRa Games, snatch king and queens into the world of the tiny-mans. It offers high-quality, wide and uncompromising strategy adventures.

The Game Offers
  • Catching multiplayer battles with competitive gaming behavior - Play with your friends and be a part of the epic multiplayer battle in the world of the Tiny-man. Command your infantry by foot, on the horseback or take control over the vehicles by land, sea or air.
  • Configure individual armor and weapons - They allow you to prepare your units in the best way to win the approaching fight. Develop your individual Kit op equipment and improve them from battle to battle.



  • Randomly generated maps - Use the terrain to surprise your enemy in an ambush or form your army to an insurmountable wall. Fight in a 1vs1 or fight with allies in a 2vs2 battle. Fight for your Supremacy in the world of Tiny-man!
  • Real-time strategy in a different way - Config Wars connects well-known game mechanics from the tactical RTS-Genre and demanding resource management into a new and gripping gaming experience for both young and old players.



  • Lovingly designed graphics - Dive into a world full of colors and crazy ideas. Let your units rise up into the air with a pigeonballon or ride on hand-drawn bears to the battlefield.

The battlefields are calling you and some Tiny-mans are already preparing themselves for the battle.
